org.antfarmer.ejce.parameter

Class RsaParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.antfarmer.ejce.parameter.AbstractAlgorithmParameters<T>
      • org.antfarmer.ejce.parameter.AbstractAsymmetricAlgorithmParameters<RsaParameters>
        • org.antfarmer.ejce.parameter.RsaParameters
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AlgorithmParameters<RsaParameters>, AsymmetricAlgorithmParameters<RsaParameters>

    public class RsaParameters
extends AbstractAsymmetricAlgorithmParameters<RsaParameters>
    AlgorithmParameters object used for RSA encryption.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ALGORITHM_RSA
      Algorithm for RSA encryption.
      static int KEY_SIZE_1024
      1024-bit key size.
      static int KEY_SIZE_512
      512-bit key size.
      static int KEY_SIZE_768
      768-bit key size.
      static String PADDING_NONE
      No padding.
      static String PADDING_OAEP_MD5_MGF1
      Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding scheme defined in PKCS #1, with MD5 message digest and MGF1 mask generation function.
      static String PADDING_OAEP_SHA1_MGF1
      Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding scheme defined in PKCS #1, with SHA1 message digest and MGF1 mask generation function.
      static String PADDING_PKCS1
      The padding scheme described in: RSA Laboratories, "PKCS #1: RSA Encryption Standard," version 1.5, November 1993.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RsaParameters()
      Initializes the RsaParameters.
      RsaParameters(TextEncoder textEncoder)
      Initializes the RsaParameters with a TextEncoder which is used to decode the key when set as a string.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RsaParameters

        public RsaParameters()
        Initializes the RsaParameters. The default transformation is 'RSA' with a key size of 512 bits.

      • RsaParameters

        public RsaParameters(TextEncoder textEncoder)
        Initializes the RsaParameters with a TextEncoder which is used to decode the key when set as a string. The default transformation is 'RSA' with a key size of 512 bits.
        Parameters:
        textEncoder - the TextEncoder
